    Our Expertise

    We have developed a site of services designed with the pressures that our customers face in mind. At Marinetime we hope to offer a one stop shop with all encompassing service solutions

    Company History

    Established in 2018 by a group of people with long experience in oil and gas, seismic and wind farm services. Since then, the company has provided fleet managemnent service for BGP in Nigeria(2019-2021). Our outsanding employees have also conducted technical, crew and commercial management for seismic and PSV (2020-present)

    Who we are
